page.title: 16Specialist Farms, Stirling
page.content:
{Kings Park Farm}has been run by the {Johnston family}for 17 years and is {crown}land. The 115 acres grow only {hay}and support varying numbers of {sheep, cows, bulls and hens.}The equipment consists of 8 tractors, a fork lift, and hay machinery. There are 14 harvest time employees.
{Falleninch}has been run by the {Hornall family}for 20 years. There are 5 workers. The farm has 150 acres of {Timothy hay}and 30 acres of{grass.}The expected yield for hay is 4 tons per acre at a price of Â£60 per ton. The farmer breeds pedigree,{Italian {Romagnola cattle}for crossing with {British}herds. There are 107 animals worth Â£1500 each. The fields graze sheep in winter. The machinery consists of 9 tractors, 3 bailers, 2 trailers, 2 turners and 2 elevators.
